description.en:
He was the strongest Emperor in the world of immortals. None of his contemporaries at the same level could even compare. He used a golden dragon as his ride, had a white tiger as a pet, and ate phoenixes for dinner. He even slept with the goddess of war and stripteased in Lingxiao Palace... Now, he is back in the city as an ordinary teacher.

"Ladies, put your clothes on. I'm here to teach!"
description.vi: Anh ta là Đại Đế mạnh nhất tiên giới, có thể đánh bại các Tiên Tôn cùng cấp một cách dễ dàng, cưỡi Kim Long, nuôi Bạch Hổ làm thú cưng, biến Chu Tước thành gà nướng. Thậm chí, anh từng chinh phục Cửu Thiên Huyền Nữ và nhảy múa ngay tại Linh Tiêu Bảo Điện... Bây giờ, anh quay về nhân gian, trở thành một giáo viên bình thường nhưng vẫn đầy phong thái. "Các em học trò, thầy đến để dạy các em làm người đấy!"

altTitles.ja: チルノちゃんは最強ですから

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

description.en: A sickly girl receives a doll from her father as present, and her father named it Medicine.

Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy suit, the unique witness corps; the blade of exile, the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded, he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

description.en: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
description.ja: 詳細不明の能力を授けられた少年ハイセ。 彼は幼馴染のサーシャとともに冒険者になるも、能力が扱えず足手まといだとチームから追放されてしまう。 さらに一人冒険者を続ける最中、罠に嵌められて絶体絶命の危機に陥ることに。 死の淵に立たされたその時、ハイセの能力『武器マスター』が目を覚ます！ それは異世界の武器を喚び出すという世界の理をも揺るがす力で！？ 逆境から始まる、異世界無双ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: マジンサーガ

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.
Being in the snow with your lover like this immerses you in a special feeling.

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

altTitles.ja: 今日はカノジョがいないから

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyou wa Kanojo ga Inai kara

altTitles.en: Today, My Girlfriend's Not Here, So

description.en: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
description.th:
ผลงานมังงะเรื่องใหม่ของ อ.อิวามิ คิโยโกะ ผู้เขียน "Luminous = Blue"
โลกความเป็นจริงกับโลกออนไลน์ สิ่งที่เปิดเผยให้คนอื่นรู้ได้กับสิ่งที่ต้องการปิดเป็นความลับจากคนรอบข้าง ใครหลายคนอาจมีโลกสองฝั่งแบบนี้อยู่เหมือนกัน
อาซาฮินะ ยูนิ คือหนึ่งในคนที่เป็นแบบนั้น แต่แล้วความลับของเธอก็ถูก ทาคิ ฟูโกะ เพื่อนร่วมชั้นคนหนึ่งล่วงรู้เข้า...

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.en:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt at treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.
description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

altTitles.ja: 皇帝の子供を隠す方法

description.en:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---

description.ko:
"이혼해 줘, 아스텔.
어차피 당신도 날 사랑한 적 없잖아?"

황제 카이젠만을 바라보며
완벽한 황후가 되기 위해 노력했던 아스텔.
하지만 카이젠의 이혼 요구에
아스텔의 10년이 하룻밤만에 부서졌다.

다시는 황실과 얽히지 않으리라 다짐하며
가족과의 연까지 끊어내고,
시골로 몸을 숨기지만…

"…임신, 하신 것 같습니다."

과연 아스텔은 카이젠과 위협 세력으로부터
황제의 아이, 테오르를 무사히 숨길 수 있을까?

---

description.uk:
"Дай мені розлучення, Астель".
Шлюб Астель не протримався і дня.
Вона тяжко працювала, щоб стати дружиною Кайзена, однак лишилася з ганьбою та прізвиськом вигнаної імператриці.
Родина її покинула.
Як і чоловік, якого вона кохала.
"Так. Твоя правда. Я тебе не кохала".
Збрехала вона наостанок.
Вона вважала, що більше ніколи з ним не зустрінеться, однак...
"Ви носите дитину".
Шість років по тому, побачивши Кайзена, вона знову йому збрехала.
"Що це за дитя?"
"Мій небіж".
Вона має захистити свого сина, що б там не стало.

---

description.en: Akari couldn't think less of her school's karate champ, Abe-kun, despite him being the national champion. He's giant, uncouth, and couldn't be more different than her sweet angel and childhood friend, Takuto. But when Abe-kun injures his arm protecting her, she takes it upon herself to get him healed—after all, the school's pride is at stake—but finds the tables suddenly turned when he confesses to her! Now she's the goal he's aiming for, and she'll soon find out how driven a national champion can be!
Alice receives an invitation to the Scarlet Devil Mansion, for what will be a quite surprising reason.

title.en: It Starts With a Kingpin Account

altTitles.vi: Vừa Chơi Đã Có Tài Khoản Vương Giả

description.en: The sudden crisis brought the earth directly into the OL era, and all of humanity fell into the hands of unknown forces. Everyone became level one. In the cruel era of the law of the jungle, high school student Ye Hao could only rise to level three. On the verge of death, he accidentally opened the king account upgrade system. Can Ye Hao become the strongest king?
description.vi: Khi một cuộc khủng hoảng bất ngờ ập đến, Trái Đất bị cuốn vào thời đại "OL", nơi toàn nhân loại trở thành những nhân vật cấp 1 dưới sự kiểm soát của một thế lực bí ẩn. Trong thời kỳ tàn khốc, nơi kẻ yếu bị loại bỏ, học sinh trung học Diệp Hạo lại mãi dậm chân ở cấp 3. Cận kề cái chết, cậu vô tình kích hoạt "Hệ thống nâng cấp tài khoản vương giả". Liệu Diệp Hạo có thể vươn lên trở thành vị vua mạnh nhất, đánh bại thế lực bí ẩn và giải cứu nhân loại?
description.pt-br: Uma crise repentina fez a Terra voltar a idade das trevas, dominada por um sistema muito parecido com o de um jogo, e toda a humanidade se viu na palma da mão de forças desconhecidas. Nessa era cruel onde os fortes devoram os fracos, o simples estudante Ye Hao chegou ao nível 3 e não conseguiu mais evoluir. Ele então acaba em uma situação de vida ou morte. Nessa situação desesperadora, Ye Hao libera o sistema de atualização do rei. E agora, até onde esse estudante poderá chegar com esse novo e desconhecido poder?

description.en:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.

title.en: Infinite Apostles and Twelve War Girls

altTitles.zh-ro: Wuxian Shitu Yu Shier Zhan Ji

altTitles.zh-hk: 無限使徒和十二個戰爭女孩

altTitles.vi: Sứ Đồ Vô Hạn Và 12 Chiến Cơ

description.en:
He is recognized as the strongest existence, standing at the top of the world.  
  
Wealth? Fame? Power? It was not worth mentioning in his eyes.  
  
The strongest apostles fled and startled the human continent for the reason: "Don’t get me wrong! Lao Zi came to look for his future wife!"  
  
Yes, it’s a story about the strongest single apostle ever looking for a wife.

Gu Tianlang, the King of the Xiaoxiao, the capital of the new fairy god, was besieged by everyone, jealous of heaven, besieged in Chiyan Ridge, tried by heaven, deprived of the fairy magic foundation, the throne of life and death, but the ancient Sirius used a Mysterious ancient jade, reborn five hundred years later! The enemies of the last life, the revenge of this life, the shame of the last life, the snow of this life! I am Gu Tianlang, and I speak for myself…  


---
description.fr: Gu Tianlang, le monarque de Chixiao, capitale de cet empereur des enfers, a été assiégé par tous. Jaloux des Cieux, il est jugé par les Cieux qui anéantissent sa cultivation, socle de vie et de mort. Cependant, grâce à un Mystérieux Jade Ancien, il reparaît cinq cents ans plus tard ! La haine et la honte de la vie antérieure seront vengées dans la nouvelle vie, et la neige tombera sur le monde ! Je suis Gu Tianlang, et je parle en mon nom…

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Moto Saikyou Kouryakusha, Nozomanu Dungeon Haishin de Musou shite Shimasu

altTitles.ja: 元最強攻略者、望まぬダンジョン配信で無双してしまう〜コーチの依頼をしてきたのは大人気アイドルでした〜

altTitles.id: Mantan penakluk terkuat, tak tertandingi dalam menghasilkan suara yang tidak diinginkan

description.en:
The dawn of dungeon conquering. A group of boys who were once known as the strongest party is wiped out in an accident. Five years have passed since then. 

Low-difficulty dungeons have been developed as leisure facilities, and dungeon conquering has become a popular content that video streamers have flocked to join. In order to survive the tough world of showbiz, current top idol Shinonome Kanami also decides to become a broadcaster who seriously conquers dungeons. The man introduced by her sponsor as the best mentor is a rather unreliable-looking man, Amano Fuyuki.

However, when they visit a dungeon together, an incident occurs right away, putting them in a desperate situation –!?
description.ja:
ダンジョン攻略黎明期。かつて最強のパーティと呼ばれた少年たちは、ある事故をきっかけに壊滅する。それから5年。

低難易度ダンジョンはレジャー施設として整備され、ダンジョン攻略は動画配信者たちもこぞって参入する人気コンテンツとなっていた。現役のトップアイドル、東雲かなみも厳しい芸能界を生き抜くために、ダンジョンのガチ攻略配信者になることを決意する。スポンサーから最高の指導役として紹介されたのは、どうも頼りなさそうな男、天野冬稀。

しかも一緒に訪れたダンジョンでは早速ハプニングが発生して絶体絶命―！？

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: Kanchigai Kekkon: Itsuwari no Hanayome no Hazu ga, Naze ka Ryuuou Heika ni Dekiaisaretemasu!?

altTitles.ja: 勘違い結婚 偽りの花嫁のはずが、なぜか竜王陛下に溺愛されてます!?

altTitles.en: Misunderstood Marriage: I Was Supposed to Be a False Bride, but for Some Reason, His Majesty the Dragon King Is Madly in Love with Me!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanchigai Kekkon Itsuwari No Hanayome No Hazu Ga, Naze Ka Ryuo Heika Ni Dekiai Saretemasu!?

description.en: Mireille, the princess of the small and struggling nation of Grilles, suddenly finds herself the subject of a marriage proposal from Cain, the king of the great nation of Drake. However, it quickly becomes clear that Cain’s true object of affection is her younger sister, and the proposal was made to the wrong person. Despite this revelation, Mireille is forced by her father to take her sister’s place and marry Cain as a stand-in bride. Prepared to bear the guilt of this deception, Mireille braces herself for a cold and loveless life. Yet, to her surprise, Cain cherishes her deeply as his bride. Why does he continue to treasure her so sincerely despite the truth?

altTitles.ja-ro: Cherry Yuusha to Sei Naru Ken

altTitles.en: Cherry Hero and the Holy Sword

altTitles.ja: チェリー勇者と”せい”なる剣

description.en: In a world where heroes are always women chosen by the gods, the legend of a male hero seems to be just a myth. However, when a young boy named Cherio finds himself in the middle of a battle against monsters that threaten humanity, a goddess grants him the power of the male hero and the ability to unsheathe the mythical Holy Sword. Now, he must decide if he is willing to risk his life, not only to save the people he loves, but to fulfill a destiny that no one thought possible.

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーZX

description.en: All three Artists in one book. Digital Versions Delisted

altTitles.ja: 穢れのない人

description.en:
Ichiro Akitaka, framed for a crime most heinous—child molestation and murder. 
Engulfed by despair and contemplating the final release of suicide, he is pulled back from the brink by the young, earnest priest, Kiba.
Despite the sordid label society had pinned to him, Kiba shows Akitaka an unending mercy and kindness.

A life of peace he'd yearned for, days unmarred by reproach.
But could such salvation truly exist in this place?

altTitles.zh: 穿成后悔偏执狂的妹妹

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

altTitles.ja: アエカナル

description.en: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

description.en:
A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62546)
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

altTitles.ja: ホテル・インヒューマンズ

description.en:
The most exquisite hotels in the world have certain standards: the finest food, the most sublime comfort, captivating entertainment, the latest weapons, reliable identity fabrication, and untraceable corpse disposal.

The name of this place where the people who have "forgotten their humanity" visit is "Hotel In Humans." The hitmen guests are welcomed by the concierges who never say "no."
description.pt-br: Os hotéis mais requintados do mundo têm certos padrões: As melhores comidas, o conforto mais sublime, entretenimento cativante, e, além disso, as armas mais recentes, fabricação confiável de identidade e descarte de cadáveres não rastreável. O nome desse lugar onde as pessoas que o visitam "esqueceram sua humanidade", chama-se "Hotel In Humans" (Hotel Desumano)

title.en: Saijaku na Boku wa "Kabenuke Bugs" de Nariagaru ~Kabe wo Surinuketara, Shokai Clear Houshuu wo Mugen Kaishuu Dekimashita!~

altTitles.ja: 最弱な僕は＜壁抜けバグ＞で成り上がる～壁をすり抜けたら、初回クリア報酬を無限回収できました！～

altTitles.en: The Evasion Skill Turns Into a “Wall Clip Bug” Under Specific Conditions! When I Clipped Through the Dungeon Wall, I Was Able To Collect An Infinite Amount of First-Time Clear Rewards and So My Stats Skyrocketed!

description.en:
In order to earn enough money for his sister, Henry set out to become an adventurer. Unfortunately, because his Disengage skill was considered useless and his stats were too low, many adventurers berated him and considered him incompetent. Even when he finally managed to join a party, he was quickly dismissed.

Out of desperation, Henry attempted a solo dive into a dungeon, and that was when he made a shocking discovery: Utilizing Disengage under specific circumstances would allow him to clip through walls. Once he clipped through the walls, he was able to bypass the dungeon boss monster and receive the clear reward. Not only that, he was able to collect the one-time clear reward an infinite number of times! By taking advantage of this loophole, Henry has the potential to grow at breakneck speeds!
description.ja: -壁抜けバグ-でレアアイテムゲットしまくり、ステータス爆上げしまくり！！　レアスキルで財宝とモンスター蠢く魅惑のダンジョンをガンガン踏破せよ！！　病弱な妹のためにお金を稼がなくてはいけない少年・アンリ。しかし、外れスキル-回避-しか持っていないせいで、パーティーのリーダー・ギジェルモから無能と蔑まれ荷物持ちをクビになってしまう。絶望の中、無謀にもソロでダンジョンに挑むアンリだったが、モンスターに襲われる中、-回避-スキルで壁をすり抜けられることに気が付き――！？　-回避-スキルで初回しか手に入れられないレアアイテムを無限回収し、底辺から成り上がれ！！

altTitles.ja: みだれたふたりのみたされごはん

altTitles.en: Make Me Eat! Make Me Happy!
A Satisfying Meal For An Obscene Pair

description.en:
The office lady who decided she wouldn't eat too much no matter how hungry she is, Hikami Runa. The high school girl who eats whenever she feels like it regardless of the time or place, Koizumi Ichika. Runa's restraint means she won't make any compromises when it comes to eating delicious things. Ichika isn't fussy when it comes to eating and doesn't know anything about ways to make things tastier.
When these two eat together, it becomes an "obsecene meal"!
description.ja: どんなにお腹がすいても暴飲暴食はしないと決めているＯＬ・氷川瑠奈。時間も場所も関係なく食べたいときにただ食べるＪＫ・小泉一花。節制しているからこそいかに美味しく食べるかに妥協を許さない瑠奈。食にこだわりがないゆえに美味しく食べる方法を何も知らない一花。そんな二人が一緒に食べる、"みたされごはん"いただきます！

altTitles.tr: Reenkarnasyon Geçirmiş Alt Tabaka Büyülü Kılıç Ustası

altTitles.fr: L'Épéiste inférieur aux Armes Magiques : Devenir le Plus Fort grâce à la Maîtrise du Tableau de Compétences

description.en: A normal office worker, Toru Minasuki, was swallowed up by a dimensional fissure and reincarnated into a different world. Upon reincarnation, Toru was given a [skill board] by God. Make the most of it to acquire all the necessary skills! Even though he is an "inferior person," he'll make his way to the top!
description.it: Un normale impiegato, Toru Minasuki, è stato inghiottito da una fessura dimensionale e si è reincarnato in un altro mondo. Dopo la reincarnazione, a Toru viene donata una [skillboard] da Dio. Ne approfitterà per acquisire tutte le abilità necessarie a sopravvivere in questo mondo! Nonostante sia una "lost person".
description.ru: Обычный офисный работник, Тору Мизунори, был поглощен огромной расщелиной и был перерожден в другом мире. После перерождения Бог дал Тору "список навыков". Сделай все возможное, что бы приобрести все нужные навыки! Несмотря на то, что он "слабейший человек", он пробьется к вершине.
description.th: มิซึโนริ โทรุ คนทำงานสำนักงานทั่วไป ถูกกลืนหายไปกับรอยแยกมิติ แล้วมาเกิดใหม่ที่ต่างโลก เมื่อมาเกิดใหม่ โทรุ ได้รับ [สกิลบอร์ด] โดยพระเจ้า ใช้ประโยชน์จากมันให้ได้มากที่สุด เพื่อรับสกิลที่จำเป็นทั้งหมด! แม้ว่าเขาจะเป็น "คนต่ำต้อย" เขาก็จะก้าวไปสู่จุดสูงสุด!
description.tr: Normal bir ofis çalışanı olan Toru Minasuki, boyutsal bir yarık tarafından yutuldu ve farklı bir dünyaya reenkarne oldu. Reenkarnasyonun ardından Toru'ya Tanrı tarafından bir [beceri tablosu] verildi. Gerekli tüm becerileri edinmek için bundan en iyi şekilde yararlanın! "Aşağılık bir insan" olmasına rağmen, zirveye doğru yol alacaktır!
description.pt-br: Um trabalhador assalariado normal, Toru Minasuki, foi engolido por uma fenda dimensional e reencarnou em um mundo cheio de vermes e monstros. Após a reencarnação, Toru recebeu um [Quadro de Habilidades] por uma deusa. Aproveite ao máximo para adquirir todas as habilidades necessárias! Mesmo sendo uma "pessoa inferior", ele chegará ao topo?

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Hunter là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy, từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến những cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Hunter với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi sắp 12 tuổi, Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào kỳ thi Hunter, ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapika, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một Hunter... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる

altTitles.en: The Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Speaks in a Heavy Dialect and It's Too Much of a Pain

altTitles.ru: Девушка, в которую я влюбился на Окинаве, говорит на очень трудном диалекте, и с ней сложно общаться

altTitles.en: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying

altTitles.vi: Cô gái tôi yêu ở Okinanawa nói tiếng địa phương, mà tôi chẳng hiểu gì hết

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.
description.pt-br: Eu, Nakamura Teruaki, me transferi para Okinawa e estou apaixonado pela Kyan, mas não entendo seu dialeto. Higa está sempre me ajudando interpretando o dialeto... Um romance intercultural um pouco incomum em uma ilha tropical está prestes a começar!
